Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Chubby \Chub"by\, a. Like a chub; plump, short, and thick. ``Chubby faces.'' --I. Taylor. [1913 Webster]

chubby adj : euphemisms for slightly fat; "a generation ago...buxom actresses were popular"- Robt.A.Hamilton; "chubby babies"; "pleasingly plump" [syn: {buxom}, {embonpoint}, {plump}, {zaftig}, {zoftig}] [also: {chubbiest}, {chubbier}]
